Title: Silvestre
Writer: João César Monteiro (scenario), Maria Velho da Costa (dialogue), João César Monteiro (dialogue)
Actors: Maria de Medeiros, Teresa Madruga, Luís Miguel Cintra, Jorge Silva Melo
Plot: The daughters of a nobleman give shelter to a stranger. After that visit ends with a severed hand, the pilgrim takes on different identities to seek revenge. The nobleman goes missing and his youngest has to pose as a knight to save him.
